TextLibrary.Text: Whoa! That's difficult. I saw something... not a fleet... but a huge ship. There was something leading the Soulless. I couldn't tell whether it was one of them or the ship itself!
Whoa! That's difficult. I saw something... not a fleet... but a huge ship. There was something leading the Soulless. I couldn't tell whether it was one of them or the ship itself!
Perhaps I can help. If we focus our minds together, perhaps we can produce an image.
Perhaps I can help. If we focus our minds together, perhaps we can produce an image.
